name: Lunarian
movement: fly 40 ft., climb 15 ft., walk 30 ft.
description: The Lunarian is a Medium-sized fey with a chaotic neutral alignment, featuring magical light and a halberd. It possesses a unique light-based aesthetic along with an elusive presence.
memorable: The Lunarian's vulnerability to natural light and its ability to inflict radiant and necrotic damage make it a unique and dangerous opponent.
goals: To thrive in moonlight and utilize its powerful abilities to combat foes.
relations: Other fey creatures and moon-related entities.
environment: Typically found in areas with strong moonlight and darkness.
strengths: High mobility, magical attacks dealing radiant damage, and ability to summon light effects.
weaknesses: Vulnerability to natural light, which can cause significant radiant damage.
attacks: Multiattack with halberd, dealing slashing and radiant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Summon Shadowbeam, creating a damaging area of effect.
senses: Has a passive Perception score of 11, showcasing a moderate awareness.
skills: Proficient in Acrobatics, Stealth, and mixed utility skills, allowing for diversified tactical options.
additional_information: Creates magical light that can't be extinguished.
Takes radiant damage if exposed to natural light.
Weapons deal additional radiant damage and cause dim light.
Can summon a damaging area of pale light and shadow.
Resistant to necrotic and poison damage.
test_queries: magical fey that deals radiant damage
chaotic creature vulnerable to natural light
agile fey that creates light effects
fey that summons beams of shadow
